title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 330-1.3 - Locations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 330-1.3 - Locations

State Regulations

Records shall be available for public inspection and
copying at offices where the records are maintained or may reasonably be made
available. Such offices may include, but shall not be limited to, the following
locations: (a) Mayor Erastus Corning
II Tower Building

Empire State Plaza

Albany, NY 12242
(b) Adam Clayton Powell Jr. State Office

Building
163 West 125th Street

New York, NY 10027
(c) Gen. Wm. Donovan Building
125 Main Street

Buffalo, NY 14203
(d) Sen. John H. Hughes State Office Building
333 E. Washington Street

Syracuse, NY 13202
(e) Utica State Office Building
207 Genesee Street

Utica, NY 13501
(f) Binghamton State Office Building
44 Hawley Street

Binghamton, NY 13901
(g) Eleanor Roosevelt State Office Building
4 Burnett Blvd. Poughkeepsie, NY 12603
(h) Suffolk State Office Bldg. Hauppauge, NY 11787
(i) Dulles State Office Building
317 Washington St. Watertown, NY 13601
(j) Henderson-Smith State Office Building
107 Broadway

Hornell, NY 14843

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
330-1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
